Title: Graham Chronofighter Oversize Black Arrow Green Celsius 2CCAU.G02A.K94N
Description: Watches Jewelry Accessories About us Policies Graham Chronofighter Oversize Black Arrow Green Celsius 2CCAU.G02A.K94N (Click to Enlarge) Graham Chronofighter Oversize Black Arrow Green Celsius 2CCAU.G02A.K94N Condition: Unworn Brand: Graham Series: Chronofighter Oversize Retail Price: $8,050.00 Reference: 2CCAU.G02A.K94N Also Known As: 2CCAUG02AK94N Web ID: 159949Stock Number: 2188692-MCase Size: 47 mm Gender: Gents Movement: Automatic Caliber: G1747 Bezel: Ceramic Functions: Hours, Minutes, Central Seconds, Chronograph, Date Strap: Rubber Clasp Type: Tang Signatures: Graham Included Items: Manufacturer's Box and Papers Power Reserve: 48 Hours Materials: Stainless Steel and PVD Case Back: Transparent (See-Through) Crown: Screw Down Dial Color: Green Military precision and handsomely styled aesthetics combine to form this distinctive timepiece from Graham that is perfect for the man with a clear heading in life. Displaying hours, minutes and seconds via central hands, the date is displayed in an aperture at the 8.30 mark. The green camo style dial features black Arabic numerals and Super-LumiNova minutes and hours hands for excellent legibility, with a green seconds hand. The chronograph function features 30-minute and 60-second accumulators at 3 and 6 o’clock positions respectively. For ultimate precision a fast action start/stop trigger with Clous de Paris grip is placed over the crown. A domed double-sided anti-reflective sapphire crystal protects the watch face and ensures a clear view of the time. The automatic mechanical movement with 25 jewels lies inside a stainless steel and PVD case with ceramic bezel. An interesting view of the mechanism is provided by the smoked sapphire crystal case-back as well as an adventurous 100m water resistance. The 47mm case is mounted onto a black rubber strap secured on the wrist with a tang buckle.Please note that some watches are on memo from other dealers and do not carry a return policy, you will be notified before your purchase if the selected watch meets this criteria.
